a.detail:
Poison Gas Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within a 10 ft. square area, DC 12 save or take 2d10 poison damage

c.detail: The scent of urine fills the corridor
c.summary: The scent of urine fills the corridor

details.floor: Uneven Flagstone (DC 10 to charge or run)
details.history: The dungeon was created by dwarves as a lair. It was eventually conquered by invaders, and has lain empty for many centuries until recently.
details.illumination: Average (shadowy in corridors, lamps or torches in most rooms)

detail.room_features: A magical idol of a god of thieves in the south side of the room summons an air elemental to serve whomever offers a prayer (but only once), and a ruined gauntlet lies in the north-west corner of the room

east.desc: Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 20 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)
Secret (DC 15 to find) Locked Iron Door (DC 25 to open, DC 30 to break; 60 hp)
east.secret: The door is concealed behind a statue of a medusa, and opened by uncovering her eyes

south.desc: Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 20 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)

detail.room_features: Part of the ceiling has collapsed into the room, and skeletons hang from chains and manacles against the south and east walls

east.desc: Locked Strong Wooden Door (DC 20 to open, DC 20 to break; 20 hp)

north.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Stuck Stone Door (DC 20 to break; 60 hp)
north.secret: The door is located several feet above the floor and designed to make noise when opened

south.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Stuck Simple Wooden Door (DC 10 to break; 10 hp)
south.secret: The door is concealed behind a statue of a terrified maiden, and opened by breaking her neck

south.desc: Locked Iron Door (DC 25 to open, DC 30 to break; 60 hp)

east.desc: Trapped and Stuck Iron Door (DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
east.trap:
Teleporter Crystal: DC 10 to find, DC 20 to disable;
    affects each creature which touches the crystal, DC 15 save or be teleported to another location

south.desc: Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 15 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)
Trapped and Unlocked Iron Door (60 hp) (magically reinforced, disadvantage to break)
south.trap:
Rune of Fear: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 11 save or become frightened for 1d4 rounds

west.desc: Locked Strong Wooden Door (DC 20 to open, DC 20 to break; 20 hp)
Secret (DC 25 to find) Unlocked Strong Wooden Door (20 hp)
west.secret: The door is located near the ceiling and concealed behind an area of mould

detail.room_features: A magical altar of a god of light in the south side of the room causes unease in any evil creature within 30 feet, and a bent key lies in the west side of the room

east.desc: Secret (DC 25 to find) Trapped and Locked Stone Door (DC 10 to open, DC 25 to break; 60 hp)
east.secret: The door is located near the ceiling and opened by twisting an iron ring
east.trap:
Contact Poison: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects each creature which touches the trigger, DC 13 save or take 2d10 damage

north.desc: Trapped and Unlocked Iron Door (60 hp) (magically reinforced, disadvantage to break)
north.trap:
Rune of Fear: DC 10 to find, DC 15 to disable;
    affects all targets within 10 ft., DC 11 save or become frightened for 1d4 rounds

Trapped and Unlocked Iron Door (60 hp)
south.trap: One-way Door: DC 15 to find, DC 15 to disable

detail.room_features: The south and west walls are covered with mould, and a rusted chain lies in the north-west corner of the room
trap:
Arrow Trap: DC 10 to find, DC 10 to disable;
    +3 to hit against one target, 1d10 piercing damage

north.desc: Locked Simple Wooden Door (DC 15 to open, DC 15 to break; 10 hp)

3300 cp, 1100 sp, 60 gp, diamond (50 gp), citrine (50 gp), sardonyx (50 gp), star rose quartz (50 gp), zircon (50 gp)
detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled an arrow pointing up on the east wall, and sporadic knocking can be faintly heard near the south wall
trap:

    +5 to hit against one target, 1d10 piercing damage

detail.room_features: Numerous humanoid skulls are scattered throughout the room, and a sundered shield lies in the center of the room

detail.room_features: A mural of a legendary battle covers the ceiling, and an altar of evil sits in the north side of the room

detail.room_features: Someone has scrawled "Upon the Night of Oaths, when the Silver Boar rests upon the tomb and iron is made flesh, the Tempest of Savagery shall be freed" on the west wall, and a rusted axe lies in the south side of the room

monster: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166) and 1 x Wolf (cr 1/4, mm 341); deadly, 100 xp

Treasure: 2000 cp, 1000 sp, 50 gp, a brass orb inlaid with copper (25 gp), a fine steel shield brooch set with amber (25 gp), a pewter crown inlaid with a meandros of silver (25 gp), a wooden orb inlaid with a meandros of copper (25 gp), a wooden scepter engraved with elven script (25 gp), an obsidian coffer engraved with draconic runes (25 gp), Potion of Fire Giant Strength (rare, dmg 187), Potion of Mind Reading (rare, dmg 188), Potion of Superior Healing (rare, dmg 187), Scroll of Protection (celestials) (rare, dmg 199)
detail.room_features: An altar of evil sits in the west side of the room, and someone has scrawled "The Scepter of Spears shall be lost until the stars fall from the sky and the Forest of Tears withers" on the north wall

detail.room_features: A magical mural on the west wall can be used to scry upon any known individual within the dungeon, and a stone stair ascends towards the north wall

detail.room_features: A ladder ascends to a balcony hanging from the north wall, and someone has scrawled "The green dragon is not a dragon" on the south wall

wandering_monsters.1: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166) and 1 x Wolf (cr 1/4, mm 341); deadly, 100 xp, consumed by disease and madness
wandering_monsters.2: Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186); hard, 100 xp, searching for an object stolen from their lair
wandering_monsters.3: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); easy, 50 xp, consumed by disease and madness
wandering_monsters.4: Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186); hard, 100 xp, scouting from another part of the dungeon
wandering_monsters.5: Goblin (cr 1/4, mm 166); easy, 50 xp, hunting for food
wandering_monsters.6: Hobgoblin (cr 1/2, mm 186); hard, 100 xp, bloodied and fleeing a more powerful enemy
